TopicTitle: Web Calculator for Distance Between Points on Any Stock/OPM Body

Articles.Content:
http://kerbalspace.agency/Tracker/distance.htm

Just something I threw together real quick, mainly for me to get a rough idea of how far things will need to travel, mainly along the ground as far distant points for aircraft would be better off with a Great Circle path rather than a direct line (calculated here via Haversine)

Pics for clicks:

(Same coordinates used by switching back and recalculating w/new body)

Update 4/28

Would also recommend HyperEdit, as you can use its Ship Lander feature to get the exact coordinates of your current location to a very high degree of precision, enabling you to measure distance on a scale of individual meters. The total distance and leg distance precision have been modified to show up to three decimal places each. So 0.325km will now show up as 324.468m
